text: Jakub Kafka (born 16 October 1976) is a Czech football player who currently plays for MFK Karviná. Kafka played for several Gambrinus liga clubs, including Baník Ostrava, Marila Příbram and Dynamo České Budějovice. In 2007, he moved to Poland to play for GKS Jastrzębie. After two years, he moved back to the Czech Republic to play for MFK Karviná. Kafka also played for youth Czech national football teams since the under-17 level. ==External links== * * * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic youth international footballers Category:Czech Republic under-21 international footballers Category:Czech First League players Category:FC Baník Ostrava players Category:FK Fotbal Třinec players Category:MFK Vítkovice players Category:1. title: Jakub Kafka
